effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 310,239 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 172,493.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

spells.description:

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,278 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 191 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,271, further increased by 343 while you remain within its light.
Equip: Your spells have a chance to call down a Voltaic Stormrook, inflicting 223,011 Nature damage split between nearby enemies and granting 2,470 Haste, further increased for each enemy struck.
